com.blockwithme.util.shared.converters

Interface ShortConverter<CONTEXT,E>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Converter<CONTEXT,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShortConverterBase

    public interface ShortConverter<CONTEXT,E>
extends Converter<CONTEXT,E>
    ShortConverter implements the conversion of some object type, to and from Java primitive short values.

    • Nested Class Summary
